Name: Operation: Lunar Duo
Description:
Enforce justice and cleanse the crimes lurking in the shadow before the Moon-Chasing Festival is around, now!

Unlock a new Companion after completing this quest.
QuestDesc:
Enforce justice and cleanse the crimes lurking in the shadow before the Moon-Chasing Festival is around, now!

Unlock a new Companion after completing this quest.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: {PlayerName}... What do you need from me?

Options.PlotLineKey: I have a favor to ask.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I see. So the puppet show performer couldn't make it to the Moonlit Fair, and now you need me to save the show.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Sure, I don't have much on my plate right now, so I can fill in for a few days—If you can afford my fees, that is.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: And if we want to perform at the Moonlit Fair, we'll need some puppets that match the vibe.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Any ideas, {PlayerName}?

Options.PlotLineKey: A fox chasing after a rabbit?
Rover and the Threnodian, recreating the legendary battle?

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Like that traditional fairy tale? Good idea. Cute animal puppets should be popular with the kids.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Like those Hero Plays? That could work. The battle between good and evil might be a big hit…

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Starting from scratch is probably too late. Fortunately, I know a place that sells ready-made puppets.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yes. In Jinzhou, you can buy ANYTHING with the right connections...

Options.PlotLineKey: Is it a black market or something?

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Just kidding. Come, let's get going.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ganxue
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Welcome to the Pioneer Association Store! Hey there, {PlayerName} and Ms. Yinlin! What can get for you today?

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We'd like some puppets.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ganxue
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Absolutely! We just received a fresh batch of new arrivals.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ganxue
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Our Pioneer Association has highly skilled puppet makers who trust us to sell their creations.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ganxue
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But not many customers come to us looking to buy their own puppets, so we only display them when requested.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ganxue
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But thankfully, there's still interest from collectors and professionals like Ms. Yinlin here who purchase these puppets.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ganxue
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'll go check our stock real quick. One moment please, I'll be right back…

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_undefined
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: In no time, Ganxue locates the puppets Yinlin needs and brings them to you.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ganxue
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Thanks a bunch! Hope to see you both again soon!

Options.PlotLineKey: Done! Let's go back to Taoyuan Vale.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hold on. I think I just saw someone I know.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Interesting… He shouldn't be here. Let's follow him and see what he's up to, {PlayerName}.

Dialogues.Speaker: Rover
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The person you're after... Is he an Exile?

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Exactly. Exiles aren't allowed in Jinzhou. To sneak in, he disguised himself and didn't wear the Exiles' uniform.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: His name is Lei. He used to involve in petty crimes and just got out of prison a few days ago.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Used to be my informant before I became an undercover agent myself, but he fled at a critical moment.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Something feels off about him being here... It seems he's talking to someone. Let's find out what he's up to.

Dialogues.Speaker: Exile
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Big Lei, are you saying… You got a new hustle for us?

Dialogues.Speaker: Lei
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hell yeah. You know who I used to , right? The Savage Beasts. Lots of cash for you.

Dialogues.Speaker: Exile
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Sweet! I'm listening. Money's been shit lately.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lei
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You know the Moonlit Fair? Lots of snobs, easy cash for the taking.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lei
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Just got outta the slammer, remember that big boss I was talkin' about? He's got the connections, loyalty, and street smarts.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lei
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Stick with him, we'll clean up at the Moonlit Fair. Soon we'll be swimming in cash!

Dialogues.Speaker: Exile
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: C-can I meet him?

Dialogues.Speaker: Lei
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: What, so you can ditch me for him?

Dialogues.Speaker: Exile
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: No joke! I'm a loyal guy. Just curious, that's all.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lei
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Then come with me and see for yourself. And keep your mouth shut! This deal's ours alone.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lei
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Big boss wants us there, 2-4 AM, east side of Taoyuan Vale. Don't mess it up! Get ready!

Dialogues.Speaker: Exile
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Got it! You can count on me!

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Looks like they're planning something. {PlayerName}, what do you think we should do?

Options.PlotLineKey: You're the expert. I'll follow your lead.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I agree. Lei mentioned a 'Big Boss'. That man must be the mastermind behind their scheme.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Lei isn't the true culprit. The so-called Big Boss must the mastermind behind their scheme.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We should track down that Big Boss. He must be the mastermind behind their scheme.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We know when and where they're meeting. Maybe we can pay them a surprise visit... What do you say?

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hold on. We don't want to tip off our target. Let's scope it out first, just the two of us.

Dialogues.Speaker: Exile
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Big Lei, when is he gonna showing up?

Dialogues.Speaker: Lei
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Just wait! Big shots always show up late!

Dialogues.Speaker: Lei
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh, he's here! Straighten up and say hello!

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_undefined
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: A familiar figure emerges from behind the tree and approaches Lei. It's someone you know all too well.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Wait. Is that…

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Uncle Li…? Stay put. Let's listen in first.

Dialogues.Speaker: Uncle Li
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Sorry I kept you waiting, Lei.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lei
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ha, no way. We just got here. Hurry up, greet our boss, Uncle Li!

Dialogues.Speaker: Exile
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We're ready, boss!

Dialogues.Speaker: Uncle Li
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hehe, youth. If I were a few decades younger, I wouldn't have needed to bother you lot.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lei
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: No problem, boss. We're just hustling for cash!

Dialogues.Speaker: Uncle Li
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Well, I'm not in this for the money… anyway, you wouldn't believe me if I told you. Where's my stuff, Lei?

Dialogues.Speaker: Lei
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Over there in the box. I once ran with the Savage Beasts for a spell, so I know a thing or two... But feel free to take a look yourself, if you want.

Dialogues.Speaker: Uncle Li
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yeah. Given how important this is, I'd better—

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Uncle Li is about to speak when the roars of Tacet Discords interrupt him.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lei
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: That sound... Damn, it's a Spearback! Must've smelled our goods!

Dialogues.Speaker: Exile
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: M-mr. Li, since you're the boss, you need to protect us, right…?

Dialogues.Speaker: Uncle Li
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: If I could be twenty years younger, I wouldn't break a sweat dealing with it! But now… Cough cough!

Options.PlotLineKey: They're being attacked by Tacet Discords.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Interesting… From what I know, Uncle Li isn't a bad person. If he was actually hiding his true nature this whole time, I have to give him some credit for fooling me.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Let's take care of the monsters first. Then we can have a proper chat with him.

Dialogues.Speaker: Uncle Li
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: {PlayerName}, and… Yinlin? What brings you here?

Dialogues.Speaker: Lei
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Thank you, thank you for saving our lives... Wait, you are...

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Keep an eye on them, {PlayerName}. I'll go see what they have here… Might be dangerous substance.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_undefined
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Shortly after, Yinlin returns.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...Just some meat, fresh and nice. No hidden compartments, and it's not poisoned.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Alright, tell me your story. What are you doing here?

Dialogues.Speaker: Lei
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'll spill everything! It was all Uncle Li's idea!

Dialogues.Speaker: Uncle Li
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hold on, {PlayerName}… Is buying meat illegal now?

Dialogues.Speaker: Uncle Li
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yeah, I've been working on a new dish—Special Jinzhou Skewers. I'm trying to sell it at the Moonlit Fair, but the taste wasn't quite right.

Dialogues.Speaker: Uncle Li
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: So, I thought about using top-quality meat and grilling it over charcoal for that perfect flavor.

Options.PlotLineKey: But what does it have to do with the Exiles?

Dialogues.Speaker: Lei
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: What? Exiles? I left that life behind when I got out of jail.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lei
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Uncle Li knows life ain't easy for a man with a past like mine. Used to run with the Savage Beasts, know how to hunt, so he hired me and my crew to fetch meat for him.

Options.PlotLineKey: Then why are you dressed up like this?
What do you mean by "we'll clean up at the Moonlit Fair"?
Why are you meeting up here at midnight in a remote place?

Dialogues.Speaker: Lei
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We were goin' huntin'. Can't wear clothes that tear easy, right? These are better for the job.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lei
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Well, because the Moonlit Fair's got easy targets everywhere... I mean, rich folks. Mr. Li's skewers are gonna sell like crazy! And he gives us a generous cut!

Dialogues.Speaker: Uncle Li
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Since I have a stall to attend to, I have to wait till the wee hours when all the customers are gone to get my supplies. Besides, look at them? They won't be allowed into the venue dressed like that.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yinlin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I see… There are no holes in your answers. Thank you for cooperating with the investigation. I apologize for the confusion.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lei
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Uh, no need to apologize to us, ma'am. I know what's up now. Gotta work on my language, drop those old habits.

Dialogues.Speaker: Exile
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I totally thought we were gonna break some laws too... No wonder they'd grow suspicious...

Options.PlotLineKey: Good to know you're doing legit work.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lei
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I will. Jail taught me, gotta make honest cash to stay outta trouble and find some damn peace in my life.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lei
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Uncle Li, heading back to the stall already? Let us handle the boxes. We'll get 'em close to the venue, but the rest...

Dialogues.Speaker: Uncle Li
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh, great! Thank you, all of you!
